subject: Re: Order #SSN5106, how did it go?
description_text:
I have not received my order and its very disappointing I've always been a
huge supporter of your products and im slowly losing faith in your company
please respond with a resolution.

David Weir

On Sun, Jan 11, 2026, 9:59 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello David, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi David Weir,    Please note that you have two tracking numbers. The first one has already been delivered, and the other is expected to arrive on the 15th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELT2220115201YQ,SF6047195322232
